pkgmetadata.longdescription: # docker_containers## Usage:```pythonimport timefrom x5_aio_pika_ext import RMQClientfrom docker_containers import RabbitContainerasync def check_connect(url): rabbit_client = RMQClient(url) await rabbit_client.is_alive() await rabbit_client.close()container = RabbitContainer(check_connect)container.start()time.sleep(180)container.stop()```
